website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, nutritionally complete, and all-natural, this grain-based mix features fewer ingredients to encourage rats to eat what they are provided and to waste less food, while maintaining a healthy weight.
pros: Wheat, whole maize, flaked peas are the first 3 ingredients
No added sugar, colorings, or flavors
cons: A simple diet that lacks attention-grabbing ingredients like seeds and nuts

customer_reviews.title: My rats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for nutritious "rat food" after my rats started to lose their hair and I learned that they might not be getting the right nutrients. I tried this, and my girls went crazy over it! They clearly love all the different food types (except the wheat grains, which they ignore), and the hard pellets are great for them to gnaw on to keep their teeth worn down (very important for rodents). And their fur started to grow back! This is clearly good food for rats (and probably other small rodents) and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Gale

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find out that not all the ingredients were listed on the description....this food is supposed to be "healthy and nutritious"! Why do rats and mice need artificial colors in their food? I avoid anything artificial in my food and I want the same for my pets. As it is, rats are so prone to cancer, why would you want to poison them like this?
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a favorite
customer_reviews.text: While my rats like most of the types of things in this food, but they do not like the little wheat looking seeds and that seems to be what is mostly in this bag. I've had to dump their food bowl every time I put new in because its full of them and nothing else. But for the price it will do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Rats LOVE this stuff...even the picky one.
customer_reviews.text: Where to start....I have been feeding our rats another high quality rat food that Amazon offers but decided to try this once based on price and reviews. My rats eat this so fast it is like a treat for them. They really seem to enjoy this food better than the other. In fact I have used pieces of it as treats to teach them tricks.The price and result are excellent,and I highly recommend trying this with your raties.
customer_reviews.author: Madladluc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for my ratties
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a food that my ratties loved and would eat. Normally they would just ignore it and throw it out of their cage. We would waste so much money. But for the first time I have found a food that they are in love with. I will be purchasing the larger bag next time. So many pet stores have what they think is rattie food but it is not. This is truly a great find!! You do know what ratties love and need
customer_reviews.author: wendellsue66

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, price was decent and rats seem to love the taste but still are a little picky and go through what they like and leave little odd ends of what they dont but for the most part mixed in with other higher protein and vitaims and of course fresh foods its great and a good value and fast delivery. Not easy food to find at the pet stores I do have to admit, at least in my area. (California-Central)
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: getting fat
customer_reviews.text: My mice are getting fat I must have one of the most picky mice in the world. She wouldn't eat a lot of different foods to the point she was too thin now I have to watch how much they eat because the picky one was eating so much she got fat fast. I have never had a picky rodent before but she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Molampy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size to Eat
customer_reviews.text: Great food for ratties. My little one's skin and coats are so soft and healthy. Also, they love the food... unlike other feeds, there aren't tons of tiny seeds that are too small for them to hold. Rats don't eat directly from the feeder, they need to have something to hold in their hands to eat, si this great.
customer_reviews.author: Friend Zone

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT, BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this stuff but won't eat the small seeds. So I've switched to this brand's Hamster food, & now they eat every morsel! AND NONE OF THE HATED GREEN OR BROWN PELLETS!
customer_reviews.author: MYSTERY007QUEEN!

customer_reviews.title: Too much CORN
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a low rating because of all...the...corn. usa corn is bad for animals and especially this much of it. The rest of the food is great but having to pull out all the corn pieces takes out alot of food. Please re formulate this with very little to no corn.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: Food of the gods as far as rat's are concerned.
customer_reviews.text: My rat's absolutely love this food, They're as enthusiastic for Reggie rat food as they are for treats. I've never seen anything like that before.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My rats think this is so much better; always find them munching on it
customer_reviews.text: Always have purchased Tropical Carnival. My rats think this is so much better; always find them munching on it!
customer_reviews.author: Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Your rats will love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, and so do our rats. It has a nice variety of ingredients, and it is one of the few mixes that doesn't include peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: sdr2000

customer_reviews.title: Won't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: My rat was not fond of this food. He didn't want to eat it. My poor little guy broke out in an allergic reaction after being fed this food. It took us a couple weeks of treatment for it to go away. I felt terrible because of the bloody scabs he developed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: animals like it
customer_reviews.text: my mice and rats liked it pretty well. i usually but the browns tropical carnival but decided to try this one. its very similiar and will purchase whichever is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great food for mice
customer_reviews.text: Tiny Friends Farm food was the best thing that ever happened for my mice. My mice LOVE this mix. It has a variety of different seeds and chips. I really am speechless at how good this food is.
customer_reviews.author: Idarmis

customer_reviews.title: They prefer this
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this stuff. I have purchased every food product for rats and some not for them and this is the stuff they love
customer_reviews.author: Puffyfish

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs approve
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a treat for my guinea pigs (on top of their guinea pig pellets) , and they loved it. It's too expensive for the amount you get though so I've switched to Sunburst.
customer_reviews.author: LNE

customer_reviews.title: This possibly killed my rat. No stars
customer_reviews.text: My rat died within 2 weeks of feeding her this food. She was fine. Then she quit eating even bananas and granola her favorite.And she died...I'm done with being a pet owner. Its too sad.
customer_reviews.author: linda s buck

customer_reviews.title: Not for my rat
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I ordered this to try it again but my rat's still hates it.
customer_reviews.author: wanda kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food!
customer_reviews.text: My mouse seemed to have liked it! This isn’t appropriate for rats though, as it has dried corn.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: My mice will eat the grains but largely ignore the pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Was picking through the bag to remove the corn n bound several live small bugs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My 2 rats love this food. Mich higher quality than most of the garbage in regular grocery stores
customer_reviews.author: Andi_AustinTX

customer_reviews.title: Rats love Reggie
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this food. There isn't much that they throw to the side like other foods. I don't mind ordering it online, it's worth it. Plus, the package is cute =)
customer_reviews.author: SweetD

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this food or should I say my rat loves this food. She gets very excited when I reach for the bag. She is healthy and her coat has become so shiny and filled in since I started giving her this food.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Demaray

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to let people buying this product to be careful. My rats loved this and the variety. However, after feeding it to them it made my rats choke. By choking I mean hyper salivating and gagging. I threw away the bag and it didn’t happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rats like it
customer_reviews.text: Our rats like this food better than the others we have tried. We have been giving this to them for months and will stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why Corn!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why is there corn in this. It is bad for rats. Major unforced error. Otherwise our ratties love it (except for those wheat looking seeds). Make it without corn and with ziplock top and we would get it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Gnirke

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my rat will empty his bowl for!
customer_reviews.author: Chenoa

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our little ones love this mix! Seeing them eating and enjoying with such gusto is definitely value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smelly smelly smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't mean to be picky because it's always nice to have food, but this product smells. It smells salty and fishy. The mice don't like it and it makes the cage smell god awful. It's like an enhanced version of the food but worse. I dunno man, these are just my observations but ever since I bought this, I've refused to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-opposable thumbs up!! for Rats.
customer_reviews.text: My rat, JellyBean, loves this. It seems to keep her attention longer than her old food.
customer_reviews.author: JellyBeanKB

customer_reviews.title: Best mouse food!
customer_reviews.text: My mouse loves to forage for his pieces. He eats it all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Nesler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: actually it deserves a ZERO star for mice. they won't touch it. do rats really eat it?!
customer_reviews.author: A. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Best rated food for ratties by ratties!
customer_reviews.text: My ratties love this food! They don't leave anything left in their bowls unlike some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Contains dye, in case you need to know.
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere looking for a mouse food that didn't contain dyes. (My son is doing an experiment and it is imperative that the food be free of it.) I searched the companies website for ingredients before having the food shipped Saturday delivery, and found no dyes listed in the ingredients, as well as several places where they list having no artificial colors in their products. So I get it today, open it up, and there it is right in the list, several artificial colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this food, which I mix with Mazuri pellets to make it more balanced.
customer_reviews.author: SE Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Too much corn!
customer_reviews.text: Too much corn, which is not good for small animals and will not give my rats
customer_reviews.author: Armanda Compagnari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've read dry corn can be unhealthy for rats, but otherwise, my pet loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Altman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rats love it but I don't love the CONSTANT price change. Update: I don't like that it has alfalfa and dried corn in it, it's like whoever made this food didn't even bother to research. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: kendal

customer_reviews.title: Too much corn, but it'll do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.text: Way, way too much corn for my liking. My rats enjoyed it, but I only fed them the one bag that I got. I now make my own grain mix and my rats love it. If you need something in a pinch, it's not horrible. Just pick out all the corn.
customer_reviews.author: C.Russell

product_meta.title: Supreme Tiny Friends Farm Reggie Rat and Mimi Mouse Tasty Mix 2lb
product_meta.description: At the Tiny Friends Farm in Hadleigh, Suffolk, Supreme believes that the very best food should be nutritious as well as ohh so delicious. Our food encourages natural foraging, and is perfect for tiny friends with big personalities. Reggie Rat & Mimi Mouse Tasty Mix is nutritionally balanced and suitable for rats and mice of all shapes and sizes. Delicious ingredients such as maize, oats, wheat and peas, as well as added vitamins provide a tasty everyday diet that helps promote your pet’s natural wellbeing and vitality. We’ve also added tasty linseed to help keep your pet’s skin and coat in the very best condition.
feature_bullets: Age Range Description: All Life Stages
